article:
Jim is a middle school student now. He's very  _  to come to the new school. He  has many new teachers and friends.  _  are all very friendly.  .
He often gets up at 7:00 in the morning.  _  he eats breakfast at 7:20. He usually comes to school at 7:40. Classes  _  at 8:00. He has Maths, Chinese, English lessons  _  8:00 to 11:00. In the afternoon, he has other lessons  like  Music, Art, PE and Computer. He often plays  _  his classmates after 5:00. He likes playing football. He eats dinner at 6:30. Usually he doesn't  _  TV in the evening. He does his homework. He goes to bed at about 9:20. He  _  his day very much.
